name: Flutter Web Dev (manual install)
postCreateCommand:
bash -lc '\
set -e; \
echo Installing deps...; \
sudo apt-get update -y && sudo apt-get install -y git curl unzip xz-utils libglu1-mesa clang cmake ninja-build pkg-config libgtk-3-dev liblzma-dev; \
echo Cloning Flutter...; \
mkdir -p /workspaces/.flutter && if [ ! -d /workspaces/.flutter/.git ]; then git clone https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git -b stable /workspaces/.flutter; fi; \
echo export PATH=/workspaces/.flutter/bin:\$PATH >> ~/.bashrc; \
export PATH=/workspaces/.flutter/bin:$PATH; \
flutter --version; \
flutter config --enable-web; \
flutter precache --web; \
flutter pub get \
'
